name: BZ Contact
description: An useful contact form application, for static web sites or landing pages. Stores submissions to MongoDB and send them by email. Integrates with MailChimp and webhooks. Pleas note: if you're using the default Postmark addon you need to open the Postmark dashboard and create a sender signature in order to be able to send emails.

MAILER_FROM_NAME.description: Name of the app owner (i.e BZContact at Example Inc)

MAILER_SUBJECT.description: Subject prefix, a space will be added

MAILER_THANKYOU_SUBJECT.description: Full subject for the thankyou mail

DATABASE_COLLECTION.description: Mongo DB collection where to store form entries (default: entries)
